MAIB Report on the investigation of windlass damage, grounding and accident to person on the ro-ro ferry Norcape in the Firth of Clyde and Troon, Scotland on 26-27 November 2011. Report No 28/2012. Published 20 December 2012.

body:
MAIB Report on the investigation of windlass damage, grounding and accident to person on the ro-ro ferry Norcape in the Firth of Clyde and Troon, Scotland on 26-27 November 2011. Report No 28/2012. Published 20 December 2012.

  
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (3,404.40 kb) 

A Safety Flyer was also produced for this incident and can be viewed on our website:  
[Read Safety Flyer](http://maib.gov.uk/publications/accident_flyers/accident_flyers_2012/norcape_flyer.cfm)
